value.name: Cleveland man pleads guilty to shooting police officer several times during domestic violence call
value.description: A 43-year-old Cleveland man pleaded guilty to shooting a Cleveland police officer several times in the arm and back on July 20, 2020. Darryl Borden was convicted of attempted felonious assault and will be sentenced by Cuyahoga County Court of Common Pleas Judge Michael Russo on June 30.

value.name: Put-in-Bay spends $21K on police investigation you can't see
value.description: A lawyer representing Put-in-Bay cited "attorney-client privilege" as justification not to release the findings of an internal investigation into police misconduct.
